statements: SELECT * FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT date_of_visit, outcome FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE date_of_visit >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT outcome FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE treatment_effectiveness > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE treatment_effectiveness < 2.0;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_effectiveness FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE date_of_visit <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_id, date_of_visit, outcome, treatment_effectiveness FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE date_of_visit >= '2022-01-01' AND date_of_visit <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, outcome FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE treatment_effectiveness > 3.5 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(treatment_effectiveness) AS avg_effectiveness, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM PatientOutcomes GROUP BY date_of_visit HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 5;

SELECT MAX(treatment_effectiveness) AS max_effectiveness, MIN(treatment_effectiveness) AS min_effectiveness, AVG(treatment_effectiveness) AS avg_effectiveness FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE outcome LIKE '%good%';
SELECT * FROM PatientData;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientData ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, phone_number FROM PatientData WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM PatientData WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM TreatmentData ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientData JOIN TreatmentData ON PatientData.patient_id = TreatmentData.patient_id WHERE TreatmentData.treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_result FROM PatientData JOIN TreatmentData ON PatientData.patient_id = TreatmentData.patient_id WHERE PatientData.age < 50 AND TreatmentData.treatment_result LIKE '%success%';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_result FROM PatientData LEFT JOIN TreatmentData ON PatientData.patient_id = TreatmentData.patient_id WHERE TreatmentData.treatment_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name FROM patients JOIN outcomes ON patients.patient_id = outcomes.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, cost FROM patients JOIN outcomes ON patients.patient_id = outcomes.patient_id JOIN treatments ON outcomes.treatment_id = treatments.treatment_id ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, AVG(effectiveness_score) AS avg_score FROM treatments GROUP BY treatment_name HAVING AVG(effectiveness_score) > 80;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM treatments ORDER BY cost DESC

SELECT patients.patient_name, treatments.treatment_name, outcomes.outcome_details FROM patients JOIN outcomes ON patients.patient_id = outcomes.patient_id JOIN treatments ON treatments.treatment_id = outcomes.treatment_id
SELECT patient_id, treatment_id, outcome_date FROM outcomes WHERE outcome_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients FROM outcomes
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, admission_date FROM Patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, outcome FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT physician_name, specialty, hospital FROM Physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, admission_date FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospitals WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT treatment_name, outcome FROM Treatments WHERE outcome IS NOT NULL ORDER BY treatment_date DESC
SELECT physician_name, specialty FROM Physicians WHERE hospital = 'ABC Hospital'
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, contact_info FROM Doctors WHERE specialization='Cardiology';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE dosage > 50 AND frequency='daily'
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors
